title: Lavender and apple tarte tatin
description: This classic French apple tart is given an English garden feel by adding lavender. All-butter puff pastry topped with lavender-scented caramelised apples.
ingredients: 2 tsp dried lavender flowers (available in the spice section of large supermarkets)
8 apples (preferably Russet or Braeburn), peeled and cored
